actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that Federal retirement cost-of-living adjustments should be effective on the same date as other cost-of-living adjustments given to federal retirement programs.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that cost-of-living adjustments for Federal retirees should be paid at the same time that other retirees receive Federal cost-of-living adjustments.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that Federal retirement cost-of-living adjustments should be effective on the same date as other cost-of-living adjustments given to federal retirement programs.
